channel.title: CVE Feed for WPCOM -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPCOM -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47378|2024-10-07T14:11:47.193Z -- wpcom -- wpcom%20member
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPCOM WPCOM Member allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WPCOM Member: from n/a through 1.5.4.
